popt4jlib
Interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf
All Known Implementing Classes:
IntSetN1AllMovesMaker, IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker, IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerMT, IntSetN21AllMovesMaker, IntSetN2AllMovesMaker, IntSetN2RXPAllMovesMaker, IntSetN2RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker
public interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf
extends java.io.Serializable

allows the definition of the neighborhood of a point in a search space that is needed by Local-Search algorithms in combinatorial optimization problems. Extends the Serializable interface so that implementing objects can be transported across JVMs in distributed computation.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2016

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou
